    • getTypeOfShip

      String getTypeOfShip()
      Method that returns the type of ship.
      Returns:
      A string that says the type of ship.

    • canPlaceShipAt

      boolean canPlaceShipAt(int x1, int y1, boolean dir, Field field)
      Method that returns a boolean value denoting whether the ship can be placed in certain position or not.
      Parameters:
      x1 - is the position in the X axis.
      y1 - is the position in the Y axis.
      dir - is the direction of the ship.
      field - is the field of the game.
      Returns:
      true if the ship can be placed in the position, false otherwise.

    • canPlaceShipAt

      boolean canPlaceShipAt(int x1, int y1, boolean dir, Ship ship)
      Method that returns a boolean value denoting whether the ship can be placed in certain position or not.
      Parameters:
      x1 - is the position in the X axis.
      y1 - is the position in the Y axis.
      dir - is the direction of the ship.
      ship - is the ship that is being placed.
      Returns:
      true if the ship can be placed in the position, false otherwise.
